Anyone watched this one yet?  This movie keeps having awful audio rips, which I refuse to watch again with horrible audio.  I don't know why whenever one movie has bad audio rips, every single rip of it always is bad audio even when it's totally different people and totally different dumps.

It used to just be easier to backup and watch my movies from digital copies by downloading the movies I have, but with so many bad uploads and bad rips with people who don't know how to do it right, I should just end up doing it all myself.  Axxo should release a guide to uploaders on how to rip with good audio and how to compress down to 700mb without losing quality.  I see 4 gig copies here with audio like they held a microphone up to their DVD player and hit "Play".
this rip is OK, good audio and video :)

FRAME RATE: 23.9
